A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They made Luke such a weak character for being supposedly the most powerful Jedi ever he was sad\, running away and plain scared of Kylo/Rey? And who were Rey’s parents again because that was a sad explanation of something they purposely built up! Poe sucked! Fin’s story line was just sad\, tucked in there but served no purpose! I’m waiting for dvd for the next movie and will not be adding to Disney pockets trying to gouge movie goers/ Star Wars fans and then deliver a crappy movie but the special effects worked!
